article_title: Republicans plan push to curb governor's powers following Obamacare dispute
article_text: FRANKFORT — A year after Gov. Steve Beshear implemented the federal health care law without legislative approval, Senate Republicans plan to push a constitutional amendment that would curb the governor's power to issue administrative regulations.
